welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Circasia, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and vibrant culture. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and discover the wonders of Circasia."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Eden Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Eden Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
